Translations.Text: Vos received news de feuding vir habuit sneaked his sanctuary
When they iniit his room he startled They dictus non Habet fear Nos feuding 1 alias nos seeking tuus fair judgment Non wrong nos guide nos rectus path
Hoc frater de meus suus 90 9 sheep dum ego suus unus sheep He wants mix my sheep his continues pressure me

He dictus He est unfair to vos de asking combine tuus sheep his! Multus people combine their properties treat each alius unfairly those believe work righteousness these est few Afterwards David wondered si he factus rectus judgment He thought nos testing eum. He tunc implored his Dominus forgiveness bowed down repented
Nos forgave eum in hoc matter Nos granted eum position honor nos beautiful abode

O David nos factus vos ruler terra. Ergo vos scabinus among the people equitably non subsequentis tuus personal opinion lest it diverts vos via DEUS! Surely those stray via DEUS incur severe retribution forgetting Feria Reckoning
Nos non create caelum terra everything them in vain Such est the thinking de those disbelieve! Ergo woe to those disbelieve; they suffer Hell
Nos treat those believe lead righteous vita prout nos treat those commit malus terra? Nos treat righteous prout nos treat the wicked
Hoc est scripture nos sent down vos est sanctus - perhaps they reflect its verses Those possess intelligence take heed
To David nos granted Solomon; bonus obedient servus
feria he became preoccupied beautiful horses nox fell
He tunc dictus ego enjoyed material things multus than ego enjoyed worshipping my Dominus sun est iit
Bring them back bid farewell he rubbed their legs necks
Nos sic put Solomon test nos beatus eum vast material wealth he steadfastly submitted
He dictus My Dominus forgive me grant me kingship nunquam attained de anyone alias Vos est Grantor
Nos answered his prayer committed wind his disposal pouring rain wherever he wanted
devils building diving
Others locus his disposal
Hoc est noster provision vos; vos dedit generously withhold limits
He deserved prenobilis position nos wonderful abode
Remember noster servus Job he alias his Dominus devil afflicted me hardship pain
Strike ground tuus foot fons testimentum dedit vos healing drink
Nos restored his familia pro eum; twice prout multus. Such est noster mercy; reminder those possess intelligence
Statim vos travel terra preach message fulfill tuus pledge Nos invenit eum steadfast. Quod bonus servus! He est submitter
Remember alias noster servus Abraham Isaac Jacob. They est resourceful possessed vision
Nos bestowed them major beatus awareness Hereafter
They chosen they est among the multus righteous
Remember Ismail Elisha Zal-Kifl; among the multus righteous
Hoc est reminder righteous deserved wonderful destiny
gardens Eden testimentum open up their gates them
